contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Ono San Pietro | official_name = Comune di Ono San Pietro | native_name = Dò | image_skyline = Ono san pietro.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = Ono San Pietro's panorama | image_shield = Ceto-Stemma.png | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 46 |latm = 01 |lats = 04 |latNS = N | longd = 10 |longm = 19 |longs = 45 |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:IT_type:city(927) | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = {{RegioneIT|sigla=LOM}} | province = {{ProvinciaIT|sigla=BS}} (BS) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 13.94 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 927 | population_as_of = | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Onesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 516 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = [[Sant'Alessandro]] | day = | postal_code = 25050 | area_code = 0364 | website = {{official|http://www.comune.ono-san-pietro.bs.it}} | footnotes = }} [[Image:mappa ono san pietro.jpg|thumb|290px|left|Ono San Pietro's land in [[Valle Camonica]]]] '''Ono San Pietro''' (Dò in [[camunian dialect]]) is a town and ''[[comune]]'' in the [[province of Brescia]], in [[Lombardy]]. The comune is bounded by other communes of Capo di Ponte, Cerveno, Ceto, Paisco Loveno. It is located near the [[Camonica]] valley and at the foot of Mt. [[Concarena]]. {{Comuni of Val Camonica}} {{commons|Ono San Pietro}} {{Province of Brescia}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Lombardy]]
